categories.name: Antifouling & Coatings
categories.description: Bottom paints, primers, érodable, topcoats for local waters, erodable

products.title: Jotun SeaForce 2.5L Black / Noir
products.description:
This is a one component acrylic, hydrolysing antifouling coating based on hydractive technology. It provides
good fouling protection. This is achieved through self polishing low friction characteristics reducing hull
deterioration. To be used as finish coat in immersed environments only. Suitable on approved primers and tie
coats on aluminium and carbon steel substrates. It can be applied at sub zero surface temperatures

products.title: Jotun SeaForce Active 04L Blue / Bleu
products.description:
This is a one component acrylic, hydrolysing antifouling coating based on hydractive technology. It provides
good fouling protection. This is achieved through self polishing low friction characteristics reducing hull
deterioration. To be used as finish coat in immersed environments only. Suitable on approved primers and tie
coats on aluminium and carbon steel substrates. It can be applied at sub zero surface temperatures

products.title: JOTUN Safeguard universal es 15L(A)+03L(B)
products.description:
This is a two component polyamide cured vinyl epoxy based coating. Specially designed as a tie coat between
epoxy primers and antifouling systems. Can be used as tie coat / holding primer for a wide range of topcoats. To
be used as tie coat in atmospheric and immersed environments. Suitable on approved primers on aluminium,
carbon steel, galvanised and stainless steel substrates. It can be applied at sub zero surface temperatures

products.title: Penguard Primer Red / Rouge 04L(A)+01L(B)
products.description:
This is a two component, polyamide cured, high molecular weight epoxy coating. It has a semi gloss finish with
fair gloss retention. Can be used as primer, finish coat or as single coat system in atmospheric environments or
as a final coat in immersed environment. To be used as topcoat in atmospheric and immersed environments.

products.title: jotamastic 80 Grey / Gris
products.description:
This is a two component polyamine cured epoxy mastic coating. It is a surface tolerant, high solids product.
Specially designed for areas where optimum surface preparation is not possible or required. Can be used as
primer, mid coat, finish coat or as single coat system in atmospheric environments. Suitable for properly
prepared carbon steel and aged coating surfaces. It can be applied at sub zero surface temperatures

products.title: Thinner / Diluant N° 07 0.8L
products.description:
This is a paint thinner. Designed to improve the flow of a range of Jotun acrylic, vinyl and antifouling coatings.
Can also be used as cleaner for pumps and tools before and after painting

products.title: Thinner / Diluant N° 17 0.8L
products.description:
This is a paint thinner. Designed to improve the flow of a range of Jotun acrylic, vinyl and antifouling coatings.
Can also be used as cleaner for pumps and tools before and after painting

products.title: HEMPEL'S Antifouling Olympic+ 72900/3017 05kg Blue/Bleu
products.description:
Hempel's Antifouling Olympic+ 72900 is a high solid, self-polishingantifouling. The robust rosin technology combined with a good biocidepackage ensures predictable antifouling protection. The use ofmicrofiber technology ensures superior mechanical strength to avoidcracking and peeling and reduces maintenance costs during repair.
Hempel's Antifouling Olympic+ 72900 can be used for bothnewbuildings and maintenance of underwater hull and boottop.Recommended for slow steaming vessels. For drydocking intervals upto 36 months

products.title: HEMPEL'S Antifouling Olympic+ 72900/1999 05kg Black/noir
products.description:
Hempel's Antifouling Olympic+ 72900 is a high solid, self-polishingantifouling. The robust rosin technology combined with a good biocidepackage ensures predictable antifouling protection. The use ofmicrofiber technology ensures superior mechanical strength to avoidcracking and peeling and reduces maintenance costs during repair.
Hempel's Antifouling Olympic+ 72900 can be used for bothnewbuildings and maintenance of underwater hull and boottop.Recommended for slow steaming vessels. For drydocking intervals upto 36 months.

products.title: SEAJET 039 Mono-Component Black
products.description:
Seajet 039 Mono-component is an ultimate performing SPC antifouling. Based on the latest resin technology from Japan it is suited to
all fouling environments and ideal for application to boats in the highest fouling areas.
Can be used on all substrates except aluminium.

categories.name: Sealants & Adhesives
categories.description: Marine sealants for deck hardware, teak, hatches, and glazing.

products.title: Sikaflex 291i 400ml white/Blanc/Black/Noir
products.description:
Sikaflex®-291i is a non-sag 1-component polyurethane sealant specifically developed for
the marine market, which cures on exposure
to atmospheric moisture.
Sikaflex®-291i meets in addition the low
spread of flame requirements set out by the
International Maritime Organisation (IMO).
▪ Wheelmark approved
▪ 1-component formulation
▪ Highly elastic
▪ Low odour
▪ Non-corrosive
▪ Can be painted
Bonds well to a wide variety of marine substrates
▪
▪ Solvent free
▪ Very low VOC
▪ Low isocyanate conten

products.title: Sikaflex 295 UV 400ml White/Blanc
products.description:
Sikaflex®-295 UV is a 1-component polyurethane adhesive of paste-like consistency that
cures on exposure to atmospheric moisture. It
is suitable for interior and exterior sealing applications and to bond organic glass in the
Marine business.
Sikaflex®-295 UV meets the requirements set
out by the International Maritime Organization (IMO).
▪ Excellent application properties
▪ Resistant to ageing and weathering
▪ Suitable for organic glasses
▪ Approved for the OEM market
▪ Wheelmark approved

products.title: JULIEN STRIAFORM 2K Epoxy Putty 01kg
products.description: 2K Thixotropic epoxy putty

products.title: Sika Primer-290 DC 225ML
products.description:
Sika® Primer-290 DC is used to improve adhesion
on Teak, Mahogany, Oregon pine and
GRP based on polyester.
Seek manufacturer’s advice and perform tests
on original substrates before using Sika®
Primer-290 DC on materials prone to stress
cracking.
This product is suitable for experienced professional
users only. Tests with actual substrates
and conditions have to be performed
to ensure adhesion and material compatibility.

products.title: EPOKUKDO YD-114 Low Viscosity Epoxy Resin 2K 01L
products.description:
EPOKUKDO YD-114 is a Bisphenol-A type liquid Epoxy Resin diluted with aliphatic glycidyl ether
(C12–C14). YD-114 is recommended for non-solvent system or low VOC coating system and has
excellent mechanical properties, chemical resistance and non-toxic minimum odor. YD-114 is
generally used in solvent-free coating, floor coating, trowelling application, crack injection systems,
adhesives, decoupage system, and high solids or low VOC industrial coatings.

products.title: TP220TICO Polyester Resin 01L
products.description:
TP220TICO is a thixotropic, pre-accelerated, low reactive, low viscosity orthophthalic unsaturated polyester resin. It is specially designed for non-critical applications. TP220 is suitable for handlay-up and spray-up applications.

MODIFICATIONS:
TICO: Thixotropic and Accelerated
CO:Pre-accelerated (Cobalt Octoat)
AABP:Amine Accelerated
UV: Contains UV Stabilizers
LSE: Low Styrene Emission
HV: High Viscosity
LV:Low Viscosity
SV:Special Viscosity

products.title: KAPCI Polyester Putty 350
products.description: Kapci 350 polyester is a general purpose putty.

products.title: GC Ecogel S3PA V2 Ral 9016 White
products.description:
Crystic Ecogel® S3PA is a high performance isophthalic neopentyl glycol gelcoat. This gelcoat is pre-accelerated and formulated for spray
application.
Crystic Ecogel® S3PA is a low VOC product.
Crystic Ecogel® S3PA has been specially designed for the production of high quality parts in the marine industry. This formulation offers an
excellent hydrolysis resistance combined with a high gloss and gloss retention.

products.title: Methyl Acetate
products.description:
Acetone is a fast-evaporating, highly effective organic solvent widely used in industry and maintenance.
It dissolves oils, resins, adhesives, and contaminants, making it ideal for surface cleaning and degreasing.
Its rapid evaporation leaves no residue, ensuring clean and ready-to-coat surfaces.
Commonly used in automotive, marine, paint, and chemical applications for reliable, efficient cleaning performance.

products.title: SARATOGA Unloose Lubricant 300ml
products.description:
Saratoga LASER is the strong throwing power fluid that melts the rust, incrustations, saltiness; it loosens in a very short time the mechanical fits, screws, bolts, hinges, bearings, locks, connections. It does not corrode metals, varnishes or rubber. It eliminates the humidity from the electric circuit; it lubricates and protects from the corrosion and the oxidation. The valve “All Positions” consents the use of the bomb in whichever position.

APPLICATION: Spray directly on the part to loosen. Leave the fluid to penetrate, therefore to unbolt.

products.title: EUROSIL Packing Tape Clear/Brown
products.description: Durable and Reliable Packing Tape, Strong Adhesion.

products.title: TECHNOPOLE Multifonction Grease
products.description:
Lithium grease is a versatile, high-performance lubricant commonly used in automotive and industrial applications.
It provides excellent resistance to moisture, heat, and heavy loads, ensuring long-lasting protection.
Its thick, stable consistency helps reduce friction and prevent wear on moving metal parts.
Widely trusted for bearings, hinges, and machinery, lithium grease delivers reliable, all-purpose lubrication.

products.title: LECHLER 00916 Water-Borne Mordant Paste 250Ml
products.description: White water-borne product containing abrasive extenders, carefully selected. It removes scratches and small defects from the painted surfaces.Ideal to remove impurities from the surface of the original coatings due to outside exposure, in contact with polluted environments. It is suitable, moreover, to remove small painting defects like dusts, sags (after sanding) and coarse sanding.Especially suitable for HS and UHS products.

products.title: KAPCI K20 Fast Cut Compound 1L
products.description:
Kapci K20 Fast Cut Compound is a high-performance polishing paste designed for rapid defect removal.
It eliminates sanding scratches, oxidation, and surface imperfections with minimal effort.
The formula delivers a smooth, high-gloss finish while reducing polishing time.
Ideal for automotive refinishing, it ensures consistent, professional-grade results on all paint systems.

products.title: PEXCRAFT Foam Polishing Pad With Holder 150*50MM/M14*2
products.description:
This foam polishing pad with holder is designed for efficient cutting, polishing, and finishing on painted surfaces.
Its 150×50 mm profile ensures smooth handling and optimal surface contact during work.
Equipped with an M14×2 thread, it fits most standard rotary polishers securely.
Durable and lightweight, it delivers consistent results for automotive and detailing applications.

products.title: PEXCRAFT Lambswool Polishing Bonnet 125mm
products.description:
The lambswool polishing bonnet is a premium-grade pad designed for high-efficiency polishing.
Its natural wool fibers provide excellent cutting power while maintaining a smooth, swirl-free finish.
Ideal for removing scratches, oxidation, and sanding marks on automotive paintwork.
Durable, breathable, and gentle on surfaces, it ensures fast, professional-quality results.

products.title: APT Plastic Backing Pad With Velcro 5"*M14
products.description:
This plastic backing pad features a 5-inch diameter and durable Velcro surface for quick pad attachment.
Designed with an M14 thread, it fits most rotary polishers used in automotive and detailing work.
Its balanced, rigid construction ensures smooth operation and consistent polishing performance.
Ideal for supporting foam, wool, and microfiber pads during cutting, polishing, and finishing tasks

products.title: APT Aluminum Oxyde Flap disc 115*22mm 4.5*7/8"
products.description:
Upgrade your grinding and finishing performance with our premium Aluminum Oxide Flap Disc 115×22 mm (4.5″×7/8″), engineered for power and precision.
Its durable, high-quality abrasive flaps deliver fast material removal while maintaining a smooth, consistent finish.
Perfect for metal fabrication, welding cleanup, and general surface prep, it’s built to outlast and outperform standard discs.
Experience cleaner cuts, longer life, and superior efficiency with every rotation—professional results made effortless.

products.title: TECHNOPOLE StarMétal / Cold Welding 85Gr
products.description:
Boost your repair efficiency with StarMetal Cold Welding 85g, the ultimate solution for fast, reliable metal bonding.
This high-performance compound restores cracked, worn, or damaged parts with exceptional strength—no heat or special tools required.
Designed to bond, fill, and rebuild metal surfaces, it delivers a durable, long-lasting hold in minutes.
Perfect for workshops and DIY users alike, StarMetal brings professional-grade results right to your hands.

products.title: ABRAPRO Adhesive Sanding Discs 125/150mm
products.description: Self-adhesive sanding discs offer fast, hassle-free attachment for smooth and efficient sanding on any surface. Their strong adhesive backing keeps each disc securely in place, reducing slippage and ensuring consistent results. Designed with durable, high-quality abrasives, they deliver superior cutting power and long-lasting performance. Ideal for woodworking, automotive, and DIY projects, these discs make every sanding task quicker, cleaner, and more professional.

products.title: EMA  Metal Cutting Disc 115/230MM
products.description: EMA Metal Cutting Discs 230mm deliver exceptional cutting power, engineered for professionals who demand precision and speed. Their high-performance abrasive formula ensures clean, smooth cuts through steel, metal alloys, and tough materials with minimal effort. Built for durability, each disc maintains consistent performance even under intense workloads. Choose EMA for reliable, long-lasting cutting efficiency that boosts productivity on every job.

products.title: Bosch 115mm Metal Cutting Discs - Stainless Steel Mild Steel Iron Ultra Thin
products.description: Bosch 115mm Ultra-Thin Metal Cutting Discs deliver outstanding precision and speed across stainless steel, mild steel, and iron. Their slim profile reduces friction for cooler, faster, and cleaner cuts every time. Engineered with Bosch’s high-performance abrasive technology, these discs offer exceptional durability and minimal burr formation. Choose Bosch for professional-grade cutting results that elevate efficiency and finish quality on every project.

products.title: DS  Steel Twist-Knot Wheel 115/125mm M14 x 2
products.description:
Steel Twist-Knot Wheel 115mm M14 x 2 for Abrasive Grinding Paint Rust Removal descaling, deburring, Metal & Stone Working, Cleaning Use with Angle Grinders
BROSSE CIRC PLAT TORSADES 0.50MM 115/ M14 RF 714

products.description:
Metal Longlife sanding disc for small or big angle grinder and bore 22.23 mm (for Steel, Ø 115/230mm)
DISQUE EBARBAGE ACIER 230X6.4X22.2 EMA
